ygData.subject: Re: Different color ROBES, and how to get them.. ..

ygData.messageBody:
Im just curious about these black robes as you say, Im a Dark Elf Wizard and
on my server (PVP) the robes are red (well blue to me for some reason but
red to everyone else). I only know of one black robe, a Flowing Black
Robe, I won't give any info on this item as some might think of it as a
spoiler.


----- Original Message -----
From: Maelstrom <Maelstrom@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 10:02
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Different color ROBES, and how to get them.. ..


> From: "Maelstrom" <Maelstrom@...>
>
> I'm kind of curious about something...if you have to put the robe in a
> bag...then get killed...then give "/consent"
> to a player to loot your corpse. Would just putting the robe in a bad and
> giving the bag to another player work?
> I Haven't tried it, but I was just curious.
>
> Skylee - High Elven Wizard - Fourth Rank - Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Did you know that ONElist hosts some of the largest lists on the Internet?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Our scaleable system is the most reliable free e-mail service on the
Internet!
>
